LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_research_adv_geo.label: advanced geothermal power
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_research_adv_geo.descrip: Allows colonists to build advanced geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted higher power..
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_research_nuclear_power.d: Allows colonists to build advanced nuclear power plants anywhere, for unlimited uninterrupted unconditional power..
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_research_adv_wind_turbin: Allows colonists to build advanced wind turbines.
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_research_adv_solar.label: advanced solar power
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_research_adv_solar.descr: Allows colonists to build advanced solar panels.
